items.q: How much does a complete visual identity cost?
items.a: A base package (logo + palette + guidelines) starts at around €500. Contact us for a free personalised quote.
Full branding: 2–3 weeks. Social templates and print materials: 1–2 weeks. We always provide a precise timeline.

items.q: What if I don't like the design?
items.a: Every project includes revisions. We work on the concept together before production, so there are no surprises.

items.q: Do you work only in Bari?
items.a: We are based in Bari but work with clients across Italy. Briefings and revisions via video call or WhatsApp.

items.q: What is included in the quote?
items.a: List of deliverables, timeline, fixed price (no surprises), number of revisions included. Everything clear before we start.
